chat.settings.import_export.export.title: Export การสนทนา
chat.settings.import_export.export.descr: ดาวน์โหลด all your conversations as a JSON file. This includes all messages, attachments, and conversation history.

chat.settings.import_export.delete.title: Delete All การสนทนา
chat.settings.import_export.delete.descr: Permanently delete all conversations and their messages. การดำเนินการนี้ไม่สามารถย้อนกลับได้ Consider exporting your conversations first if you want to keep a backup.
